com.quorum.tessera.config.keys

Class KeyEncryptorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quorum.tessera.config.keys.KeyEncryptorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyEncryptor

    public class KeyEncryptorImpl
extends Object
implements KeyEncryptor
    An implementation of KeyEncryptor that uses Argon2

    The password is hashed using the generated/provided salt to generate a 32 byte hash This hash is then used as the symmetric key to encrypt the private key

        public Key decryptPrivateKey(PrivateKeyData privateKey)
        Description copied from interface: KeyEncryptor
